text: Okay, very nice, Ike, thank you. All right, children, it looks like we have no more contestants, which means, the Talent Show is over!

title: ERECTION DAY
text: Mr. Mackey, it's over.

title: ERECTION DAY
text: Huh?  Oh oh oh, right.

title: ERECTION DAY
text: Now we will tally up the judges' scores and find out which act they hated the least.

title: ERECTION DAY
text: Hold everything!  Mrs. Garrison, if you don't mind, I'll be taking that microphone..

title: ERECTION DAY
role: Okay, let's put our hands together for
text: Jimmy Valmer.

title: ERECTION DAY
role: Wow, what a terrific audience. So apparently
text: it's been exactly two years since the fall of Baghdad. Have you seen this? Have you heard about this? Just as B-Bush predicted, Baghdad fell, Iraq fell, Saddam fell. The only thing that didn't fall was ...the price of gas.  I just read in the paper that China's protesting Japan. Have you seen this? Have you heard about this? Yeah, I guess in China you don't get to-  You've gotta be kidding me.
